lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Monday with a preview of the Jacksonville-Houston N.F.L. game misidentified the player shown with the ball for the Texans. He is Andre Johnson, a receiver, not Steve Slaton, a rookie running back.
snippet: A picture caption on Monday with a preview of the Jacksonville-Houston N.F.L. game misidentified the player shown with the ball for the Texans. He is Andre Johnson, a receiver, not Steve Slaton, a rookie running back.
